name: Hyper Detective
description:
This case sounds fishy, lieutenant!
Roll in the suspects and use your fine skills of observation and deduction to find out who's guilty!

Watch out for the clues that will help you in your investigation. But be careful! Do not point fingers at the innocent!

Oh, so you're a taxidermist? What's that, zebra hair on the crime scene? Bim Bam Boom GUILTY! You got the right to remain silent mr. suspicious!

- Multiple cases to solve
- Easy one-touch controls
- Weird but useful clues that will help you in your investigation
